entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 09:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -16.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -19.4°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
